posts.post_content: I absolutely adore this guy. He's got a big punch and he's also got the added benefit of not coming into play tapped, meaning you can tap him for man or use him as a defender on the turn he comes out. My absolute most favorite land in a long while!
posts.html:

Posted By: Oleander (2/2/2010 10:56:30 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
At its worst, its a Mana you can use to play something else. At its best, Its a swinger for 4 that can also block and kill most early-game creatures. It also has the psychological effect of the opponnent never knowing whether he should attack, since he knows you have a nigh-upon untouchable blocker waiting there.  
  
Also, so long as you didn't play the Manland THAT turn, it does NOT suffer summoning sickness.
posts.html:
At its worst, its a Mana you can use to play something else. At its best, Its a swinger for 4 that can also block and kill most early-game creatures. It also has the psychological effect of the opponnent never knowing whether he should attack, since he knows you have a nigh-upon untouchable blocker waiting there.

Also, so long as you didn't play the Manland THAT turn, it does NOT suffer summoning sickness.

Posted By: Dr.Pingas (10/3/2010 3:52:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Oh people this guy is soo good for real. I play casually and I have a playset of Mishra's Factory and 2 Celestial Collonade in my control deck, so I don't run this guy, but my buddy runs 2 or 3 all the time and they seriously work so good. I've played with them a couple times a while back, and they always came through. the fact that you don't have to sacrifice the land like Gargoyle Castle, or that it stays as a creature permanently like Stalking Stones makes this soo good. You can Wrath of God/Day of Judgment and then attack, and usually you'll have the mana when you're running the long game of Control. And it's out of reach of sorcery speed removal or aura's. And the 4 power is just huge. Stalking Stones is just too weak for a huge cost, and Gargoyle Castle loses the ability to add mana if you need it. This guy is a beautiful medium. Great card, and excellent in Standard.
posts.html:

And the 4 power is just huge. Stalking Stones is just too weak for a huge cost, and Gargoyle Castle loses the ability to add mana if you need it. This guy is a beautiful medium. Great card, and excellent in Standard.

posts.post_content:
@Twinsuit  
  
Day of Judgement is a sorcery, your opponent cant play it during your turn.  
There's only one Combat phase where you're able to attack. You could activate your Dread Statuary, but it couldn't attack unless you made it into a creature BEFORE you attacked.  
  
Also, great card.
posts.html:
@Twinsuit

Day of Judgement is a sorcery, your opponent cant play it during your turn.
There's only one Combat phase where you're able to attack. You could activate your Dread Statuary, but it couldn't attack unless you made it into a creature BEFORE you attacked.

Also, great card.
